original: Chop one medium onion finely for the sauce.
Use medium-sized tomatoes for the salad.
Add a medium carrot to the stew for added color and flavor.
Peel and dice a medium-sized potato for the hash browns.
For every cup of flour add a medium egg for binding.
Include a medium clove of garlic in the marinade.
Use medium shrimp for the stir-fry.
Combine a medium-sized banana with yogurt for the smoothie.
